title: MY ACCOUNT IS GLITCHED! I KEEP GETTING CHAT RESTRICTIONS EVERY TIME THEY FINISH IT COMES BACK AGAIN.
body: It has happened 5 times in a row so it is obviously not just a coincidence. Every time i finish the chat restrictions and play a game without it i do not say a word. I don't type at all and after the game the chat restrictions come again. This has happened 5 times and i have made sure not to type a single word to make sure it's not actually me being rude and getting banned. Please Riot fix my account?

replies.body:
suck shiet you lying sack of shiet! 

You probably one of those guys that rages at people during champ select and says GG before the game even begins
